import { Code, Eye } from "lucide-react"; const ProjectCard = ({ title, description, tags, imgSrc, liveLink, codeLink }) => (

{title}

{description}

{tags.map(tag => ( {tag} ))}
Live Demo View Code
); export default ProjectCard;
